column4: run firestarter on machine that's already connected to the internet
maby I don't have your situation understood properly, you have a wireless router that you want to get the laptop working with
it's easy to use (gui) and it has internet connection sharing built in
it also will run dhcp server to the wireless router
I'm just listing what you can do with it
I'll try yours next if malt's doesn't work, his sounds better at the moment.
one very important detail: the machine that connects directly to dial up is running ubuntu, right?
as I stated, it's running windows.
